actionCalls.description: Gets the ids for the sites nearest to the contact.
actionCalls.name: getNearbySiteIDs
actionCalls.label: Get Nearby Site IDs

actionCalls.name: mergeRecordListToIdList
actionCalls.label: Merge Record List To Id List

assignments.description: Adds the shift id to the shifts with Active job offers collection
assignments.name: assignShiftIdForActiveJobOffer
assignments.label: Assign Shift Id For Active Job Offer

assignments.name: clearShiftIdsWithActiveJobOffersForContact
assignments.label: Clear ShiftIds With Active JobOffers For Contact

choices.description: Chose to sort in ascending order.
choices.name: ascendingChoice

choices.description: Chose to sort in descending order.
choices.name: descendingChoice

constants.description: The execute param for the FindWorkTiles LWC.
constants.name: executeFindWork

constants.description: The showDistance param for the FindWorkTiles LWC.
constants.name: showDistance

decisions.description: The main decision for which screen to display
decisions.name: decideWhichScreenToDisplay
decisions.label: Decide Which Screen To Display

decisions.description: Checks if the job type resource is set
decisions.name: isJobTypeResourceSet
decisions.label: Is Job Type Resource Set

decisions.description: Iterates the number of days set using a counter to create a short list of shift IDs for the days calculated from today and spanning the number of days.
decisions.name: iterateNumberOfDays
decisions.label: Iterate For Number Days To Build Shift IDs Shortlist

dynamicChoiceSets.description: The Job Types presented as options in the job type filter lookup.
dynamicChoiceSets.name: AllJobTypes

formulas.description: The end date for the current iteration. Allows filtering for the date plus 1
formulas.name: currentIteratorEndDate

formulas.description: The calculated date for the end of the date selection
formulas.name: endDate

formulas.description: Determines if the filter is valid
formulas.name: isValidFilter

formulas.description: The formatted text of the selected value of the Highest Severity Broken picklist, provided to the Find Work Tiles component.
formulas.name: maxSeverity

loops.description: Adds the shift ids from the active job offers to a collection to use in a query
loops.name: getShiftIdsForActiveJobOffers
loops.label: Get Shift Ids For Active Job Offers

recordLookups.description: Gets all active job offers for the contact. Note the dates are filtered just for the exact timespan required. No allowance is currently made for a day on either side to allow for clientside timezones against server UTC. This should be addressed in the future
recordLookups.name: getActiveJobOffersForContact
recordLookups.label: Get Active Job Offers For Contact

recordLookups.description: Gests the shifts including the job type filter in the query. Note the dates are filtered just for the exact timespan required. No allowance is currently made for a day on either side to allow for clientside timezones against server UTC. This should be addressed in the future
recordLookups.name: getShiftsWithJobTypeFilter
recordLookups.label: Get Shifts With Job Type Filter
recordLookups.filterLogic: (1 AND 2 AND 5 AND (3 OR 4)) AND ((6 AND 7) OR (8 AND 9))

recordLookups.description: Gets the shifts not including the job type filter in the query. Note the dates are filtered just for the exact timespan required. No allowance is currently made for a day on either side to allow for clientside timezones against server UTC. This should be addressed in the future
recordLookups.name: getShiftsWithoutJobTypeFilter
recordLookups.label: Get Shifts Without Job Type Filter
recordLookups.filterLogic: (1 AND 2 AND 3) AND ((4 AND 5) OR (6 AND 7))

screens.description: Get the dates to create the shift Ids shortlist
screens.name: datesScreen
screens.label: Dates Screen

fields.name: DatesScreenMessage
fields.fieldText: Please choose the first date you are interested in and how many days from that date to search.

validationRule.errorMessage: The date must be today, or greater

screens.description: A screen to display fields for filtering
screens.name: filterScreen
screens.label: Filter Screen

fields.name: FilterScreenMessage
fields.fieldText: You can apply a free text filter to only show shifts that include the text you enter. If you want to use different options in the search, please use the “Preferences” tool instead.

fields.name: freeFilterTextbox
fields.helpText: Must be blank or contain at least 3 characters.

validationRule.errorMessage: The filter must be blank or contain at least 3 characters.

screens.description: Screen to allow input of sorting Parameters
screens.name: sortScreen
screens.label: Sort Screen

variables.description: The Value of the resource button used to determine which screen to display
variables.name: buttonResourceValue

variables.description: The current date for the loop
variables.name: currentIteratorDate

variables.description: A text filter for free text
variables.name: freeTextFilter

variables.description: Specifies whether toasts need to be displayed when a new job offer is generated. Can be used as an input.
variables.name: hideApplyToast

variables.description: determines if the sort screen shows 'distance' as an option.
variables.name: includeDistance

variables.description: determines if the sort screen shows 'relevance' as an option.
variables.name: includeRelevance

variables.description: determines if the sort screen shows 'shortlist' as an option.
variables.name: includeShortlist

variables.description: If true, the results are sorted in ascending order, otherwise descending order.
variables.name: isAscending

variables.description: The Resource for the maximum distance override
variables.name: maximumDistanceOverride

variables.description: A collection of IDs for sites nearest to the contact
variables.name: nearbySiteIDs

variables.description: The number of days from the start date for input
variables.name: numberOfDays

variables.description: The Number of Days counter
variables.name: numberOfDaysCounter

variables.description: Specifies the default value of the Approval Required field of any job offers generated. Can be used as an input.
variables.name: offersRequireApproval

variables.description: The recordId for the contact
variables.name: recordId

variables.description: The title given to each screen, allowing for css to be added to centre the text
variables.name: screenTitle

variables.description: The currently selected job type
variables.name: selectedJobType

variables.description: A collection of shift Ids where the contact already has an active job offer
variables.name: shiftIdsWithExcludedJobOffersForContact

variables.description: A shortlist of shift IDs
variables.name: shortlistIds

variables.description: A Temp Sort By Param used by the sort screen
variables.name: sortBy

variables.description: Does the sort screen show the options in alphabetical order.
variables.name: sortFieldsAlphabetically

variables.description: The start date for input
variables.name: startDate
